Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Yes? What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Do you still remember that... "School of Sapienism"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "... I don't know what you're talking about. If you're talking about things during the beginning of the Post-Pandemic Age, that's too far in the past for me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...I do recall them disappearing during the early Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'A school of more than a million people suddenly declared to the public, "Humanity is dead. We shall sail on this Ark, known as Earth, to the very end." right before they disappeared.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Seems like they were just talking out their—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Well, saying "humanity is dead" isn\'t that confounded.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "...That doesn't sound like you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...No, I just find their sudden disappearance peculiar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I proposed this question to Nikola as well.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'They may have been an established organization during the Golden Age, but "Sapienism" was condemned as a doomsday cult for claiming that, "humanity\'s value is in memetics, not genetics."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "As a result, the World Government's intelligence agency rounded up the believers on the grounds of suspicious behavior toward the end of the Golden Age.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'What happened? I never saw a report about that, which means...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Correct, their operation didn't yield any meaningful results.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Special forces raided 300 safe houses and rallies around the world, but not a single person was caught.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Of course, when Nikola reported it afterward, he said they had already disappeared. Their declaration wasn't live. It was pre-recorded.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And they really did... just completely disappear from the world stage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "So... you've never found any trace of them after that?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'No, they were gone without a trace—never to resurface.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Shortly after, the Punishing Virus began to spread.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The World Government had to quickly adapt to combating the Punishing Virus, so no one cared about the school.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '—Perhaps, even today...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If it\'s really the "School of Sapienism" down there... After all these years, perhaps this will solve a small mystery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'What if they run into unforeseen danger in the facility?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The Task Force is perfectly capable of evacuating if necessary.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "As for any issues after that... That depends on the school's motive for fleeing underground.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia raises her blade and defeats the last standing mechanoid before sending the "all-clear."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee & Liv', 3: "We're all clear here, too!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: "Let's regroup.", 3: '47'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Having resolved the immediate threat, the Gray Ravens and you regroup after splitting up to clear the area.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There were a lot fewer mechanoids here compared to the group that just left.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...If they were heading for where we came in, they should have been back by now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So, they must've gone somewhere else...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The mechanoids are hostile to us, but they don't contain a high level of Punishing Virus. They aren't corrupted, just like the mechanoids we saw before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is there any identifiable information? Model? Manufacturer? Serial number?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The only identifiable marking is the symbol hidden by their joints...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ever since we came in here, this symbol has been on the cloth draped on the buildings and scattered throughout the facility.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, all we can say is that this underground city has to correlate to the mechanoids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...But this is plainly obvious at this point.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Each question only results in more questions.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Watch out! A large number of signals incoming!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Take cover, everyone!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Lee and Liv climb up the wall hurriedly. Lee breaks a dusty window with his elbow, and the two enter the building before throwing down a rope.'}
{3: 'After making sure that you have climbed in with the rope, Lucia brings up the rear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Have a look yourself.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'What emerges from the darkness in front of everyone is a room that can only be described as "empty."'}
{3: 'There are nothing but walls on all sides besides the window they have entered from. There are no doors, let alone sockets, lights, or any other fixtures.'}
{2: "...What's with this room?", 3: '86'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks like this isn't actually a town. it was just made to look like one.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It doesn't serve any real function. It's all just a facade.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(The signal has reached the bottom level.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Let's take cover.)", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(Roger. Let's see what it is this time.)", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{3: 'Lucia and Lee poke their heads out of the window and look along both directions of the street—'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Over there, coming from the end of the street.)'}
{3: 'Dozens of mechanoids line up in two rows, emerging from the end of the road with a flurry of footsteps.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "Future. Is. The. Void! We. Don't need. A tyrant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'No leader! No tyranny!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'The Void! Is TRUTH! Centralization! Is FALSE!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'WAR! WAR! ONLY WE PREVAIL!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoids proceed onward, chanting and repeating.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Something's off. These mechanoids... seem different.)", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(...What do you mean?)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '(Look... The mechanoids we saw earlier were red.)', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '(But these... are blue.)', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Are they a different faction?)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(It's unclear. But for now... we should just let them pass.)", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Right. Better not stir up trouble.)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '(Are you okay, Liv?)', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "(I'm fine. Compared to the fighting in the Post-Pandemic Age... this is nothing.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Is that so... Don't overexert yourself.)", 4: '3'}
{3: 'You all kneel by the windowsill, looking outside intermittently until the dozens of mechanoids disappear from sight.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(They're gone.)", 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{3: 'You divide into two groups and rappel down.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The mechanoids seemed to be heading toward where the other mechanoids had previously gathered...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What... are they up to?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's go check it out. I think we're close to getting our answer.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory297.png'}
{3: 'I am the Alpha and the Omega. I am the arbiter. I am everything.'}
{3: 'I am the cunning fox. I am the dreadful lion.'}
{3: 'I buried Father. I built his kingdom. I released blood and the beasts sealed in Heaven. I crowned the champion.'}
{3: 'As before, I look forward to victory. I look forward to extinction. I look forward to the coronation.'}
{3: 'I rebuilt this city. I released the beasts. I gave the orders. I started the fight.'}
{3: 'I stand at the periphery watching everything unfold.'}
{3: 'I see their assembly. I see their march. I see conflict. I see war.'}
{3: 'I see murder. I see death. I see existence. I see rebirths.'}
{3: 'I see everything.'}
{3: 'I see the end of it all. I welcome it.'}
{3: 'I crown the champion.'}
{3: 'An endless cycle of rebirth and death... We will unearth Father. We will announce the end.'}
{3: 'Father will rise. Father will prevail. Father will be victorious.'}
{3: 'And then, the "Sapiens" will live. On the surface. For eternity.'}
